b.form_header: DECLARATION OF CITIZEN'S MOVEMENT IN EXCEPTIONAL CASES
b.declare_need: I declare that the need for travelling at

options.1: Visiting a pharmacy or a doctor or going for blood donation
options.2: Visiting a shop/supermarket for essential supplies/services
options.3: Visiting the bank for services that online transactions are not possible
options.4:
Visiting public services or services of the wider public sector and local 
authorities only for urgent needs
options.5:
Helping people who cannot take care of themselves or people who must 
be protected or who are in self-isolation and/or in compulsory isolation 
(quarantine)
options.6:
For physical activity or for pet needs, provided that there are not more 
than two people together and restrict themselves in areas adjacent to 
their residence
options.7:
Going to a ceremony (e.g. funeral, wedding, christening) of first and 
second degree relatives not exceeding 10 people
options.8: Any other reason, as stated below:

b.id_note: Note: The citizens should carry their identity card/passport
